title: U.S. Senate Impeachment Trial of Former President Trump
author: C-SPAN
description:
The Senate Impeachment Trial of former President Trump continues with the start of opening arguments from House Republican Impeachment Managers, and Donald Trump’s Defense team.
https://www.c-span.org/video/?508293-1/impeachment-trial

localize.description:
参议院对前总统川普的弹劾审判继续进行，众议院共和党弹劾经理人以及川普的辩护团队开始进行开场辩论。
https://www.c-span.org/video/?508293-1/impeachment-trial

localize.title: 美国参议院对前总统特朗普进行弹劾审判

localize.description:
參議院對前總統川普的彈劾審判繼續進行，衆議院共和黨彈劾經理人以及川普的辯護團隊開始進行開場辯論。
https://www.c-span.org/video/?508293-1/impeachment-trial
